task.title: What to Do When You Leave
task.shortdesc: Before you leave to go to school, make certain a few things happen.

step.cmd: Pack your bag and make ure you have everything you need.
Turn off the TV and other major electronics
Make certain all of the lights are out
step.info: Double check Bridget's closet and Bathroom, she often forgets those.

step.cmd: Lock the door to the balcony
Lock the main door when you leave.
